interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 1408 (Two-Disc Collector's Edition)
Review Date: 2012/06/07
Store: John Cusack  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Horror
Product Description: ['(Thriller) Based on a short story by Stephen King, a man who specializes in debunking the paranormal checks into the infamous room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel, only to discover\x85 the terror is real.']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Thriller', 'Format': "Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Collector's Edition, Widescreen", 'Contributor': 'John Cusack', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 44 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Media Format': "Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Collector's Edition, Widescreen", 'Run time': '1 hour and 44 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 2, 2007', 'Actors': 'John Cusack', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: What's not to like??? Another great Stephen King movie with great actors like John Cusack and Samuel L Jackson. Stephen's movies are always so fascinating, his plots rarely cease to amaze me. Always something different, he thinks outside of the box.
Review Title: LUV IT.....
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
The Dame Edna Experience - The Complete Collection (Series 1/2 & Specials)
Barry Humphries  (Actor),     Emily Perry  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, BBC, All BBC Titles
['Ten hours of outright hilarity make up this 5-disc Ednathon,', 'The Dame Edna Experience: The Complete Collection', ". Every program from Dame Edna's hysterical and historical series plus over 4 hours of side-splitting extras make this collection a must-have for Edna's legion of die-hard fans!"]
{'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Box set, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Robin Houston, Charlton Heston, Barry Humphries, Jeffrey Archer, Emily Perry', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '5', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 5.5 x 1.9 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Box set, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '10 hours and 4 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 5, 2004', 'Actors': 'Barry Humphries, Emily Perry, Robin Houston, Jeffrey Archer, Charlton Heston', 'Studio': 'BBC Worldwide', 'Number of discs': '5'}
I saw her/him on Graham Norton a while ago. They did a repeat show and I just had to have more. Dame Edna reminds me of the humor we had years ago. She is so quick and witty. You won't be disappointed to get these collections - they are gold....
WONDERFULLY HYSTERICAL !!!!!
1408 (Two-Disc Collector's Edition)

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Strong affinity for comedy, particularly classic and witty performances, but also appreciates well-crafted thrillers, indicating a broad interest in cinematic storytelling.
- **Content Preference:** Enjoys episodic collections and box sets for extensive viewing, alongside collector's editions that enhance the movie experience.
- **Nostalgia Factor:** Draws enjoyment from humor and narratives that evoke memories of past comedic styles and significant cultural moments, reflecting a nostalgia for traditional storytelling.
- **Engagement with Media:** Engaged with various media formats, particularly DVDs and collector's editions, suggesting a preference for physical collections that offer substantial content.
- **Rating Behavior:** Provides high ratings for content that fulfills emotional and entertainment needs, with an increasing appreciation for intricate plots and performances in non-comedic genres, as seen in reviews for thrillers.
- **Influences:** Influenced by personalities on talk shows and the breadth of actors' performances, illustrating an interest in the craft of acting beyond just comedy.
- **Community Connection:** Likely part of or appreciates communities of fans that share similar tastes, reaffirmed by being a "die-hard" fan and actively engaging with a range of genres.

Overall, the user values quality comedic content and gripping narratives, often seeking comprehensive collections that showcase a wide array of beloved performers while finding enjoyment in well-executed thrillers.
